articles.description: Alex Petrie scored 27 points and E.J. Stephens scored 16 with six assists and three rebounds and Lafayette pulled away from American with a 90-83 win on Saturday.
articles.headline: Lafayette pulls away from American 90-83 behind Petrie

articles.description: Andrew Brown scored 20 points with seven rebounds and led five players in double-figure scoring and Furman beat Samford 94-79 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Brown's 20 points helps Furman beat Samford 94-79

articles.description: Cassius Winston gets the ball at the top of the arc and drains a cold-blooded triple as Michigan State takes a 4-point lead over Northwestern in an eventual 65-60 win.
articles.headline: Clutch Winston 3-pointer cements Spartan comeback

images.caption: Cassius Winston gets the ball at the top of the arc and drains a cold-blooded triple as Michigan State takes a 4-point lead over Northwestern in an eventual 65-60 win.
images.name: Clutch Winston 3-pointer cements Spartan comeback

articles.description: Tony Washington scored a career-high 20 points and pulled down a career-best 14 rebounds as La Salle overcame a slow start to beat George Mason 69-62 on Saturday afternoon to halt a three-game losing skid.
articles.headline: Washington has career day, La Salle rallies for 69-62 win

articles.description: Tyler Nelson scored 32 points, becoming Fairfield's all-time scoring leader, and the Stags beat Quinnipiac 102-98 in double overtime Saturday, despite a career-high 40 points by Rich Kelly.
articles.headline: Fairfield beats Quinnipiac 102-98 in 2OT; Young sets mark

articles.description: Chris Sengfelder tallied 17 points, Justinian Jessup scored 15 on five 3-pointers and Chandler Hutchison notched a double-double to power Boise State to a 76-52 victory over Air Force on Saturday.
articles.headline: Boise State runs past Air Force 76-52
